propertyTypes.label: Property Types
propertyTypes.description: Property type objects that can be inherited by propertyTypes in objectTypes.
propertyTypes.brief: Property type objects that can be inherited by propertyTypes in objectTypes

originURI.label: Origin URI
originURI.description: The origin URI of this model.  Descendant object types should be used for any deviations.  This URI may be different from the URI within this instance of Adaptive Framework.
originURI.brief: The origin URI of this model

custom.label: Custom
custom.description: Qualifier custom:: variables available to model expressions.
custom.brief: Custom variables available to model expressions

collectionURIs.label: Collection URIs
collectionURIs.description: This is the URIs of the collections this map is a part of and preferably a URIs that can be used to locate an object with objects type _AdaptiveCollection_ that describes the collections.  If a collection is used outside of the local instance, it should be a full URI.  The URI can also be a local path of the collection object or just the collection's objectId if it resides in the in the same adaptor.
collectionURIs.brief: The URIs of the collections this map is part of
